body_html:
Thank you for your patience.

Weight dtype is already inferred from inputs dtype (unless explicitly specified in the layer constructor) in the base layer's __call__, and thus this PR is not warranted. See: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/layers/base.py#L598

As a general feedback point for future PRs: when submitting PRs for such fixes, please include unit tests (a test that would fail at master but would pass with the proposed fix).

body:
Thank you for your patience.

Weight `dtype` is already inferred from inputs dtype (unless explicitly specified in the layer constructor) in the base layer's `__call__`, and thus this PR is not warranted. See: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/layers/base.py#L598

As a general feedback point for future PRs: when submitting PRs for such fixes, please include unit tests (a test that would fail at `master` but would pass with the proposed fix).
